title: Everton vs West Ham - Premier League 2019/20: Live score and updates
text:
Everton host West Ham at Goodison Park in the first Premier League clash on Saturday lunchtime following the international break.

The Toffees will be desperate to put on an emphatic display in front of their own fans at Goodison Park after dropping into the relegation zone last time out following their 1-0 defeat at Burnley.

Meanwhile, Manuel Pellegrini's men will be hoping to repeat the result of this exact fixture from last season - where they won 3-1.

Sportsmail's Jonathan Spencer will provide live Premier League coverage of Everton vs West Ham including score, lineups and build-up.
description: Everton will be desperate to put on an emphatic display in front of their own fans at Goodison Park after dropping into the relegation zone last time out following their 1-0 defeat at Burnley.
